plot: The visitor from the future, a time traveler, tries to cancel disasters in our time for save the Earth in the future.
plot_en: The visitor from the future, a time traveler, tries to cancel disasters in our time for save the Earth in the future.
plot_es: The visitor from the future, a time traveler, tries to cancel disasters in our time for save the Earth in the future.
title: Le visiteur du futur
